title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1601.3 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1601.3 - Reports

State Regulations
(a) Annual reports. An authority shall file an annual report in the office of the commissioner not
later than November 1 of each year or at such other time which the commissioner
may fix. Such report shall include: (1)
the
data specified in subdivision 2 of section
37
of the

Public Housing Law; (2)
such other
information which the commissioner may request. (b) Reports on costs of projects. Upon the
completion of each Federal, State or municipal project, or upon request of the
commissioner prior to completion, an authority shall file with the commissioner
a detailed statement of the cost of such project. (Public Housing Law, ยง38.)
(c) Reports to other
agencies or officials. For the information of the commissioner, an authority
shall file with the commissioner, a copy of each report, financial statement, operations and maintenance statement, etc., filed with any Federal, State or
municipal agency--at the same time that said report is filed with such
agency. (d) Reports on legislation, limitation and opinions of counsel affecting low rent housing projects. An
authority shall file with the commissioner, as soon as is practicable: (1)
a copy of each proposed local law which
may affect any existing or proposed low rent housing project in the
municipality in which the authority is established; (2)
details of any litigation in the
municipality which may affect any existing or proposed low rent housing project
in said municipality; (3)
any
opinion of the corporation counsel or other chief legal officers of counsel
thereto which may affect any existing or proposed low rent housing project in
the municipality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1601.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
